testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlCCTVInventoryRequest dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.2.1 [Need to Share CCTV Device Inventory] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Send CCTV Inventory Information Upon Request (NTRM 3.3.5.3.1.1}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N25R508_Send_CCTV_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter = ${TMDD_N25R508_Send_CCTV_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R377_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R377_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Controller Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R379_Controller_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R379_Controller_Description_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Node Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Name - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Direction - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference Version is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Uniform Resource Locator (URL) (DeviceURL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported = ${TMDD_N25R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device URL Reference Medium is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Text Insertion - CCTV Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R514_Text_Insertion___CCTV_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R514_Text_Insertion___CCTV_Inventory_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R515_Camera_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R515_Camera_Type_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Pan Left Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R516_Camera_Pan_Left_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R516_Camera_Pan_Left_Limit_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Pan Right Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R517_Camera_Pan_Right_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R517_Camera_Pan_Right_Limit_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Tilt Up Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R518_Camera_Tilt_Up_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R518_Camera_Tilt_Up_Limit_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Tilt Down Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R519_Camera_Tilt_Down_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R519_Camera_Tilt_Down_Limit_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Zoom Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R520_Camera_Zoom_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R520_Camera_Zoom_Limit_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Focus Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R521_Camera_Focus_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R521_Camera_Focus_Limit_Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Iris Limit is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R522_Camera_Iris_Limit_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R522_Camera_Iris_Limit_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Camera Environmental Features is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.3.1.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R523_Camera_Environmental_Features_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R523_Camera_Environmental_Features_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N25R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N25R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}
Step 30 CONFIGURE: Define the message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: RequestMessage: ${RequestMessage}
Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorResponseExpected: ${ErrorResponseExpected}
Step 32 CONFIGURE: IF ErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: ErrorTypeExpected: ${ErrorTypeExpected}

Step 33 REQUEST-RESPONSE-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlCCTVInventoryRequest RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N25R508_Send_CCTV_Inventory_Information_Upon_Request_Parameter REQUESTMESSAGE = RequestMessage ERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = ErrorResponseExpected ERRORTYPEEXPECTED = ErrorTypeExpected

Step 34 IF ErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 34.1 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.3 VERIFY that a device-id data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.4 VERIFY that a device-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.5 VERIFY that a device-name data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.6 VERIFY that a cCTVInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 34.7 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.8 VERIFY that a cctv-requests-supported-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.9 VERIFY that a cctv-image-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.10 IF TMDD_N25R376_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.10.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.11 IF TMDD_N25R377_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.11.1 VERIFY that a device-description data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.12 IF TMDD_N25R378_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.12.1 VERIFY that a device-control-type data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.13 IF TMDD_N25R379_Controller_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.13.1 VERIFY that a controller-description data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.14 IF TMDD_N25R380_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.14.1 VERIFY that a network-id data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.15 IF TMDD_N25R381_Node_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.15.1 VERIFY that a node-id data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.16 IF TMDD_N25R382_Node_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.16.1 VERIFY that a node-name data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.17 IF TMDD_N25R383_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.17.1 VERIFY that a link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.18 IF TMDD_N25R384_Link_Name___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.18.1 VERIFY that a link-name data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.19 IF TMDD_N25R385_Link_Direction___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.19.1 VERIFY that a link-direction data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.20 IF TMDD_N25R386_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.20.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.21 IF TMDD_N25R387_Linear_Reference_Version_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.21.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference-version data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.22 IF TMDD_N25R388_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.22.1 VERIFY that a route-designator data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.23 IF TMDD_N25R389_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.23.1 VERIFY that a device-url data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.24 IF TMDD_N25R390_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.24.1 VERIFY that an url-reference-medium data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header.device-url
Step 34.25 IF TMDD_N25R391_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.25.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 34.26 IF TMDD_N25R514_Text_Insertion___CCTV_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.26.1 VERIFY that a cctv-titling-text data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.27 IF TMDD_N25R515_Camera_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.27.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-type data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.28 IF TMDD_N25R516_Camera_Pan_Left_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.28.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-pan-left-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.29 IF TMDD_N25R517_Camera_Pan_Right_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.29.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-pan-right-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.30 IF TMDD_N25R518_Camera_Tilt_Up_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.30.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-tilt-up-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.31 IF TMDD_N25R519_Camera_Tilt_Down_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.31.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-tilt-down-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.32 IF TMDD_N25R520_Camera_Zoom_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.32.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-zoom-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.33 IF TMDD_N25R521_Camera_Focus_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.33.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-focus-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.34 IF TMDD_N25R522_Camera_Iris_Limit_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.34.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-iris-limit data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.35 IF TMDD_N25R523_Camera_Environmental_Features_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 34.35.1 VERIFY that a cctv-camera-environmental data element exists within each instance of data frame cCTVInventoryMsg.cctv-inventory-item
Step 34.36 VERIFY that the values within the RESPONSE message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 35 IF ErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 35.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 35.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 35.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 35.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 35.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 35.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to ErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 35.7 IF TMDD_N25R14_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 35.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 36 EXIT
